Package cz.vse.java.util

Class Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.vse.java.util.Token
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Token
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    The class of Token is used to abstractly define the type of the instances.

    Instances of this class are used for authentication of the connection between devices mostly.

    The token is set of randomly generated characters sealed in this instance.

    Written for project "Connections".
    Version:
    04. 03. 2020
    Author:
    Vojtěch Pavlů
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
